targets.query:
from(bucket: "proxmox")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "cpustat" and
    r._field == "cpu"
  )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "pve-100")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)

from(bucket: "proxmox")
  |> range(start: -20s)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "system" and
    r._field == "uptime" and
    r.host == "pve-300" and
    r.object == "nodes"
  )
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      r with
      _value: float(v: r._value) / 86400.0
  }))

from(bucket: "proxmox")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "cpustat" and
    r._field == "wait"
  )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "pve-100")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn:mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r.host =~ /^${Host:regex}$/ and
    r._measurement == "mem" and
    r._field == "used_percent"
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 10s, fn: last)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value:r._value, _time:r._time, _field:r._field}))
action:"block" AND interface:vtnet0 AND NOT src-ip:93.49.80.101 AND NOT src-ip:172.24.1.*

from(bucket: "proxmox")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "cpustat" and
    r._field == "cpu"
  )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "pve-300")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)
interface:$iface AND src-ip:$src_ip AND dst-port:$dst_port AND action:"block" AND source:$Host
interface:$iface AND NOT src-ip:93.49.80.101 AND NOT src-ip:172.24.1.58 AND src-ip:$src_ip AND action:"block"

panels.title: Firewall Blocked Event Locations on vtnet0

targets.query:
from(bucket: "proxmox")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "cpustat" and
    r._field == "wait"
  )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "pve-300")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn:mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "proxmox")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "avail" or r._field == "used")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["nodename"] == "pve-100")
  |> last()
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with 
    _time: r._time,
    _measurement: r.measurement,
    _field: "used_perc",
    _value: float(v: 100) / (float(v: r.avail) + float(v: r.used)) * float(v:r.used)
     }))
  |> drop(columns: ["avail","used"])

from(bucket: "proxmox")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "avail" or r._field == "used")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["nodename"] == "pve-300")
  |> last()
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with 
    _time: r._time,
    _measurement: r.measurement,
    _field: "used_perc",
    _value: float(v: 100) / (float(v: r.avail) + float(v: r.used)) * float(v:r.used)
     }))
  |> drop(columns: ["avail","used"])

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r.host =~ /^${Host:regex}$/ and
    r.gateway_name =~ /^${Gateway:regex}$/ and
    r._measurement == "gateways" and
    r._field == "delay"
  )

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r.host =~ /^${Host:regex}$/ and
    r.gateway_name =~ /^${Gateway:regex}$/ and
    r._measurement == "gateways" and
    r._field == "loss"
  )

list.definition:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
|> filter(fn:(r) => r._measurement == "pf")
|> keyValues(keyColumns: ["host"])
|> group()
|> keep(columns: ["host"])
|> distinct(column: "host")
list.label: OPNsense
list.name: Host

list.definition:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn:(r) => r._measurement == "disk" and
  r.host =~ /^${Host:regex}$/)
  |> keyValues(keyColumns: ["device"])
  |> group()
  |> keep(columns: ["device"])
  |> distinct(column: "device")

list.definition:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
    r._measurement == "interface"
  )
  |> keyValues(keyColumns: ["name"])
  |> group()
  |> keep(columns: ["name"])
  |> sort(columns: ["name"])

list.definition:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
|> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
|> filter(fn:(r) => r._measurement == "gateways" and
  r.host =~ /^${Host:regex}$/)
|> keyValues(keyColumns: ["gateway_name"])
|> group()
|> keep(columns: ["gateway_name"])
|> distinct(column: "gateway_name")

list.definition:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "interface")
  |> last()
  |> group(columns: ["tag"])
  |> keep(columns: ["name"])
list.label: FW_Interface
list.name: iface
list.query:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "interface")
  |> last()
  |> group(columns: ["tag"])
  |> keep(columns: ["name"])
